description: Exist any trace, such that Zurich is connected to Paris through any trace.
Exist any trace, such that Zurich is connected to Paris through any trace with one failover link.
Exist any trace from Zurich to Budapest.
Exist a trace from Toronto and a stack [2882] of size one, such that it is connected to Singapore through any trace.
Exist a trace from Toronto and a stack [2882] of size one, such that it is connected to Singapore through two sub traces linked to Amsterdam.
Exist a trace from Toronto and a stack [2882] of size one, such that it is connected to Singapore through two sub traces linked to Amsterdam with one failover link.
